name: Macro Oscillator 2
description: Implementation of the open source Plaits module by Emilie Gillet, offering a wide range of synthesis models.

parameters.name: Model
parameters.description: Chooses the synthesis model.

parameters.name: Coarse tune
parameters.description: Coarse tuning control.

parameters.name: Fine tune
parameters.description: Fine tuning control.

parameters.name: Harmonics
parameters.description: Sets the harmonics control.

parameters.name: Timbre
parameters.description: Sets the timbre control.

parameters.name: Morph
parameters.description: Sets the morph control.

parameters.name: FM
parameters.description: Sets the FM depth.

parameters.name: Timbre mod
parameters.description: Sets the timbre modulation depth.

parameters.name: Morph mod
parameters.description: Sets the morph modulation depth.

parameters.name: Low-pass gate
parameters.description: Sets the LPG colour (VCFA-VCA blend).

parameters.name: Time/decay
parameters.description: Sets the envelope decay time.

parameters.name: Trigger input
parameters.description: Selects which bus is used as the trigger input (0=None, constant sound).

parameters.name: Level input
parameters.description: Selects which bus is used as the level input (0=None).

parameters.name: CV input
parameters.description: Selects which bus is used as the pitch CV input (0=None).

parameters.name: FM input
parameters.description: Selects which bus is used as the FM input (0=None).

parameters.name: Harmonics input
parameters.description: Selects which bus is used as the harmonics input (0=None).

parameters.name: Timbre input
parameters.description: Selects which bus is used as the timbre input (0=None).

parameters.name: Morph input
parameters.description: Selects which bus is used as the morph input (0=None).

parameters.name: Main output
parameters.description: The bus for the 'Main' output (0=None).

parameters.name: Aux output
parameters.description: The bus for the 'Aux' output (0=None).

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: Output mode (Add/Replace).

parameters.name: Main gain
parameters.description: The level of the 'Main' output signal.

parameters.name: Aux gain
parameters.description: The level of the 'Aux' output signal.

parameters.name: MIDI mode
parameters.description: Controls the algorithm's response to MIDI.

parameters.name: I2C mode
parameters.description: Controls the algorithm's response to I2C.

parameters.name: MIDI channel
parameters.description: The MIDI channel to receive on (0=Omni).

parameters.name: I2C channel
parameters.description: The I2C channel to receive on (0=Off).

parameters.name: 0 1 0 The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above. Main gain
parameters.description: The level of the 'Main' output signal.

parameters.name: below. I2C mode
parameters.description: Controls the algorithm's response to I2C. See

parameters.description: The level of the 'Main' output signal.

parameters.description: Controls the algorithm's response to I2C. See

input_ports.name: Trigger
input_ports.description: Trigger input for the internal envelope.
